import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faAngleLeft, faEnvelope, faUnlockAlt } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { faFacebookF, faGithub, faTwitter } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import { Col, Row, Form, Card, Button, FormCheck, Container, InputGroup } from '@themesberg/react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Routes } from "../../routes"; import BgImage from "../../assets/img/illustrations/signin.svg"; import { registerR, registerRagazo } from "../../featchers/UserOspita/userSlice"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default () => { const [register,setRegister]=useState('') const dispatch=useDispatch() const ragazzo=useSelector(registerR) const handelChage=(e)=>{ setRegister({ ...register, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } console.log(register) const handelRegister=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(registerRagazo(register)) } return (

{/* Back to homepage */}

Create acount Ragazzo

or

); };
